short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minecraft Block Fall is a simple and fun puzzle-like game, by placing tiles of the same type together and clicking to explode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minecraft Block Fall is a simple and fun puzzle-like game, by placing tiles of the same type together and clicking to explode. Your job is to be clever enough to explode all the boxes and you will win and go to the next level
